dublinCore.dc:title: 118 HR 5708 IH: MCM PRV Reauthorization Act
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mr. Finstad (for himself and Mr. Phillips) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Energy and Commerce

form.official-title: To amend the Federal Food, Drug, and Cosmetic Act to extend a priority review program to encourage treatments for agents that present national security threats.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the MCM PRV Reauthorization Act.

section.header: Extension of priority review to encourage treatments for agents that present national security threats
section.text: Section 565A(g) of the Federal Food, Drug, and Cosmetic Act (21 U.S.C. 360bbbâ€“4a(g)) is amended by striking 2023 and inserting 2033.
